Ingredients.4: 1 pound salmon fillets, cut into 1 inch cubes

Ingredients.8: 2 medium green bell peppers, cut into 2 inch pieces

Directions.1: Combine tzatziki sauce, lemon juice, and lemon zest in a bowl. Add salmon, toss to coat, and marinate in the refrigerator for 15 minutes.

Directions.2: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate.

Directions.3: Combine garlic, oregano, and olive oil in a bowl. Add green peppers, red onions, and grape tomatoes.

Directions.4: Beginning and ending with salmon, thread salmon, grape tomatoes, red onions, and green peppers onto 8 skewers.

Directions.5: Cook salmon skewers on the hot grill until fish is opaque in color, turning every 5 minutes, about 15 minutes total. Top with feta cheese and extra tzatziki sauce.
